# supportsAlpha

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the color picker supports alpha values.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var supportsAlpha: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], people can only pick fully opaque colors from the color picker.

## Configuring color picker attributes

- **title**: The title for the color picker.
- **maximumLinearExposure**: The maximum exposure to apply to a color when returned by the color well.
- **supportsEyedropper**: If set to `NO` the eyedropper functionality is not supported for this color well.
- **selectedColor**: The selected color in the color picker.
